channel.title: 404 Error
channel.description:
Well, everytime im trying to run Moparscape webclient or Silabsoft webclient im getting an 404 error.
With Silabsoft Webclient:
[code]Not Found The requested URL /loaderror_savefile.html was not found on this server.
Additionally, a 404 Not Found error was encountered while trying to use an ErrorDocument to handle the request.
Apache/1.3.41 Server at client.silabsoft.org Port 80[/code]
And with Moparscape webclient the window goes away..
If anyone knows the answer or could help me, please help me.
Greetz Christiaan20

item.title: 404 Error
item.dc:creator: @n0va_k0 n0va k0
item.description:
@n0va_k0 wrote:

Try downloading the mopar client. Or maybe I’m wrong, it COULD be your java but I doubt it because it would show a large red x on the top of the screen
